illandril-token-tooltips.setting.visibil: Tooltip Visibility adjusts which tokens show tooltips for players. Tooltips are shown for all tokens for GMs.
Neutral and Friendly Tokens (PC and NPC)
illandril-token-tooltips.setting.itemsMi: Players must have the specified permission for an actor to see item details in that actor's tooltip. This setting does not impact GMs. Note: Item visibility is also controlled for each individual item in the actor's sheet (currently only available for the default 5e character sheet).
illandril-token-tooltips.setting.spellsM: Players must have the specified permission for an actor to see spell slot details in that actor's tooltip. This setting does not impact GMs.
illandril-token-tooltips.setting.hidePla: Hides Item details in player tooltips from GMs. This setting does not impact players, nor does this impact NPC tooltips for GMs.
Hide Player Spell Slots from GM
Hides Spell Slot details in player tooltips from GMs. This setting does not impact players, nor does this impact NPC tooltips for GMs.
